info.title: Drachenboot Manager API
info.description: API documentation for the Drachenboot Manager application with multi-team support.

get.description: Fetches all teams ordered by name.

delete.description: Deletes a team and all its related data (paddlers, events, attendances, assignments). This is a cascade delete operation.

get.description: Fetches all paddlers for a specific team.
Fetches all events for a specific team with attendances and assignments.

post.description: Creates a new event (training or regatta).

delete.description: Deletes an event and all its guest paddlers (cascade deletes attendances and assignments).

post.description: Replaces all seat assignments for an event. Deletes existing assignments and creates new ones.

assignments.description: Map of seatId to paddlerId (or canister-N)

post.description: Creates or updates a paddler's attendance status for an event.
Increments the canister count for an event.

delete.description: Decrements the canister count. Only works if there are unassigned canisters.

400.description: Canister ID required or canister is assigned

post.description: Creates a guest paddler for a specific event with automatic attendance.

delete.description: Deletes a guest paddler (cascade deletes attendance and assignments).

post.description: Calculates optimal seat assignments based on paddler pool and constraints using the Magic AI algorithm.
